thread.title: Burt Holt
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Burt Holt

author: Burt Holt
title: Burt Holt
text: Great service / was not rushed , what u do not find much of today . Most salesman are gone in 60 second , sir I'll be right back , I came in to look at mattress for my sons bed and your salesman took his time and showed me and his mother which one we should get ,I was looking for one around $ 300.00 but ended up getting a top of the line ones for $ 700.00 and your salesman sold me over $7100.00 living room suit that we have been going from store to store and have not seen and anything close to one like this . Ps . YOU HAVE A GREAT SALEMAN AT THE WARREN STORE ( MICHAEL EDGE ) YOU NEED MORE LIKE HIM . Burt
